channel.title: Blog on OSCAL
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on OSCAL

item.title: Blog Posts Archive
item.description: 2023/09/06 OSCAL's Fall Cleaning -- Dr. Michaela Iorga, Director, OSCAL Program oscal@nist.gov Welcome to the Open Security Controls Assessment Language (OSCAL) Blog, open to the NIST OSCAL Team and to the community! If you work closely with us, you might have noticed we finished a large code repository reorganization alongside the release of OSCAL v1.1.0 and the subsequent OSCAL v1.1.1 release. The OSCAL Project was in a desperate need of some internal restructuring, a fall cleaning of sorts.
